sqlMap.select: select n.order_id,n.cp_notify_num,n.cp_notify_status,n.cp_notify_time from mt_orderinfo_notify n WHERE (n.cp_notify_status='00' OR (n.cp_notify_status='11' AND n.cp_notify_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MINUTE))) AND n.cp_notify_num < 6 ORDER BY n.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,20

select n.out_notify_num,n.order_id, date_format(n.out_notify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as out_notify_time, date_format(n.out_notify_finish_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as out_notify_finish_time, out_notify_status from mt_orderinfo_notify n where (n.out_notify_status='00' OR (n.out_notify_status='11' AND n.out_notify_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MINUTE))) AND n.out_notify_num < 10 ORDER BY n.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,20
